Mathematical Expression: m_n: U^{\otimesn} -> U for n >= 1, with Ainfty homotopy relations

Axiom: 4. Embedding of Lie, Clifford, Jordan, and Exceptional Algebras
Mathematical Expression: exists maps from Lie(g), Cl(p,q), J_3(O) -> U
U(n) subseteq U for arbitrarily large n
exists modular embeddings f: SL(2, Z) -> Aut(U)

Axiom: 7. Universal Structure Persistence Beyond Classical Dimensions
Mathematical Expression: exists structure-preserving maps at arbitrarily high dimensions
U_i * U_j + U_j * U_i = i(U_i - U_j)
